name: 与雾雨魔理沙一起偷重要的东西 ~ Happy Stealing with Kirisame Marisa
description: 《Happy Stealing with Kirisame Marisa》is a Touhou fan-made horror game, you are playing as Kirisame Marisa who are trying to steal important things from Koumakan, and exit safely. This game follows the Touhou Project Steam Publishing Statute.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32/64bit Processor: Inter Core i3-530 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 480 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: All KInd
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 32/64bit Processor: Inter Core i5-7300HQ Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: All KInd
